messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello?
Hello, do you have a police, fire, or medical emergency?
Oh, yeah. Are you going to help me? Because I'm bleeding. A lot.
Where are you bleeding?
It's on my head. I have a problem with my eye. I'm bleeding so bad I can't see. I think you broke my jaw and my hand definitely.
Okay, try to put something on the eye to stop the bleeding.
I don't think I can see from this eye. There's blood going everywhere.
He's beating me with something. I'm bleeding to death.
What's happening? Where is he now?
I think I'm going to die at this point. We have medical on the way, too, okay?
I won't be able to open the door. He's going to try to kill me, my husband. Please help.
Is he black, white, Hispanic, or Asian? How old is he?
I'm trying to get a chance to see. I don't know. I can't see because of the blood.
Okay. Is he still armed? Does he have any other weapons?
I don't know. I don't think so.
He's going to get in the house. We have dogs in the backyard. Please help me.
Can you give me a further description of your husband? Is he medium-built, thin, or heavyset?
He's medium-built. He's wearing green shorts.
Okay. Do you have any guns in the house or anything like that?
No. He's an ex-con.
I'm bleeding a lot and he's going to come after me again.
We have medical on the way. Stay with me, okay?
Ma'am, can you see out of the other eye?
Yes, but barely. The ice is on my eye.
Okay, help is coming. Hang in there.
Roll medical now, expedite medical. Severe head injury.
Ma'am, go get the trauma pad out of the ambulance or the squad car. We've got medical on the way.
